alert.note: Alert for Grainger; Hamblen; Jefferson; Knox; Sevier (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 14 at 6:55PM CDT until August 14 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Knox County in east Tennessee... Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Grainger County in east Tennessee... North central Sevier County in east Tennessee... West central Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 754 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Plainview, or 12 miles southeast of Maynardville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Morristown, Sevierville, Jefferson City, Dandridge, New Market, Strawberry Plains, Blaine, House Mountain State Park, and Alpha. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 394 and 423. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 2. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
